flawed_nl_solution:
There were 1150-150=<<1150-150=990>>990 people who didn't vote for John
That means James got 990*0.7=<<990*0.7=693>>693 votes
So the other candidate got 990-693=<<990-693=297>>297 votes
This means he got 297-150=<<297-150=147>>147 more votes than John.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1000, not 990. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
